This object is a very sophisticated example of this game, signed by  Léonard Limosin and dated back to 1537. #KidsMW #MuseumWeekpic.twitter.com/pEqrlunbFD

This was a popular theme in Japan, and probably inspired his still life with a crab. The Japanese example became ‘counsellor and guide in [almost] everything’. #VanGoghJapan http://vangogh.com/stKP30iUUNR pic.twitter.com/3mxUqyDvJE
